title: Complete checkout with valid card payment
preconditions: User is logged in and has a valid cart with shipping information.
steps: 1. Navigate to the checkout page. 2. Click on 'Pay' button. 3. Enter valid card details. 4. Complete 3-D Secure authentication if prompted. 5. Confirm payment.
expected: Order confirmation page is displayed with order number and summary. Confirmation email is sent. Stock is reserved.
